title: Main level 2Br w/Granite counters, Appliances, A/C, W/D, Vinyl floors!
posting_body: Main level has 2 bedrooms & full bath while 2nd level has master suite with 3/4 bath.
Kitchen features granite counters, stainless steel appliances, & vinyl plank flooring.
Full bathroom has tile flooring & tile surround shower/tub.
Other conveniences: unfinished basement, garage, & nicely sized, fenced backyard.
Appliances included: fridge, stove, dishwasher, washer, dryer, & window a/c unit (no central air).
Applicant 18+ must apply, submit credit & background check .
Prospective tenant(s) must gross monthly 3x the monthly rent rate, $4,500 - must be verifiable.
Cats & dogs welcome for per pet fee of $250.
(note: dog subject to review depending on breed).
No current or prior evictions or felonies.
